long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nextsense Issue Certificate Extension is web browser extension that supports the issuance and installation of a user certificate, which then serves as a login and authentication for access to the user section of the website of the Official Gazette of the Republic of Northern Macedonia.

This product is developed to generate certificate signing request, submit the request to certificate authentication server and then install the issued certificate in the current user store.
